data.name: New Analysis
Start Your Analysis
This is a mockup. Click "Start Analysis" to generate a sample report and navigate the app.
data.value: Esta es una maqueta. Haz clic en "Iniciar Análisis" para generar un reporte de muestra y navegar por la aplicación.

data.name: Upload Resume
Describe Yourself
Resume Already Uploaded

You have already uploaded a resume and completed the analysis. You can only upload one resume per account. If you need to update your profile information, please use the "Update Profile" feature in your dashboard.
data.value: Ya has subido un currículum y completado el análisis. Solo puedes subir un currículum por cuenta. Si necesitas actualizar la información de tu perfil, por favor usa la función "Actualizar Perfil" en tu panel de control.

data.name: Upload Disabled
You have already completed your resume analysis
data.value: Ya has completado el análisis de tu currículum

data.name: Visit your dashboard to view your analysis results
data.value: Visita tu panel de control para ver los resultados de tu análisis

data.value: Haz clic para subir o arrastra y suelta

data.name: PDF files only (MAX. 10MB)
We'll analyze your resume and provide career insights
data.value: Analizaremos tu currículum y proporcionaremos perspectivas profesionales

data.name: File Analysis
Brief introduction about yourself
Tell us about your experience, skills, and career goals...
data.value: Cuéntanos sobre tu experiencia, habilidades y objetivos profesionales...

data.name: This field is pre-filled from your latest profile analysis.
data.value: Este campo está pre-llenado desde tu último análisis de perfil.

data.name: What are your future career goals?
e.g., Lead a team of developers and contribute to open-source projects
data.value: ej., Liderar un equipo de desarrolladores y contribuir a proyectos de código abierto

data.name: What are you currently doing (studies, work, projects)?
e.g., Working as a full-stack developer and mentoring junior engineers
data.value: ej., Trabajando como desarrollador full-stack y mentorizando ingenieros junior

data.name: What are your main motivations?
e.g., Solving complex problems and learning new technologies
data.value: ej., Resolver problemas complejos y aprender nuevas tecnologías
